title: Xbox Game Studios: What Are Our Expectations? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 07.29.20
description:
Blessing and Greg round out the week by answering all of your Xbox Game Studios questions and discussing the trickle of news from yesterday's Xbox Showcase.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:06:00 - Housekeeping
Our new First Impressions Preview of Crash Bandicoot 4 is up on youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames. Tim calls it the Sonic Mania of Crash
Saturday, it’s the second episode of the Xcast with SnowBikeMike, Gary, and Alanah!
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Mohammed Mohammed & Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:12:00 -  Halo Infinite’s Demo Was a Work-in-Progress Build - Jordan Oloman @ IGN
00:23:30 - Do you think Xbox should have been up front about the game being an early build? - Best Friends Q:GroovyMuse
00:24:30 - Do you think that this kerfuffle could have any sort of impact on people's perception of the game? - Best Friends Q:OMGTURTLES73
00:35:18 -  Even Rare isn’t sure about what Everwild’s Gameplay is - Tom Ivan @ Video Games Chronicle
00:42:03 -  Dontnod's Tell Me Why aims for a transgender story not "rooted in pain or trauma" - James Batchelor @ GiBiz
00:49:00 - Do you think this approach is going to work for Microsoft? Do you think that Microsoft's slate of AA titles can put up similar numbers to Playstation's exclusives (via GamePass)? - Travis Gajkowski
01:01:30 -  KLARNA
01:02:50 - Ghost of Tsushima is selling like hot cakes
0105:06: -  Red Dead Online is receiving a 'Massive' New Update Next Week - Matt Purslow @ IGN
01:09:10 - Suikoden’s creators are crowdfunding a spiritual successor - Andrew Webster @ The Verge
01:10:30 - G4 is Back?!
01:14:00 - Out today
01:15:40 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:
Monday: Blessing and Tim
Tuesday: Blessing and Imran
Wednesday: Greg and Gary Whitta
Thursday: Greg and Blessing
Friday: Greg and Major Nelson
itunes:author: Kinda Funny
